metadata.paper_name: Additive friction stir deposition-enabled upcycling of automotive cast aluminum chips
metadata.sample_id: Automotive cast Al chips AFSD upcycling (as-printed)

material_input.base_alloy: Automotive cast Al-Si (hypereutectic) machining chips (mixed Teksid Al alloys)

process_parameters.process_description: AFSD consolidation/upcycling of cold-pressed porous feed-rods made from automotive cast Al machining chips; printed wall structure in as-printed state without post-deposition heat treatment

physics_and_environment.peak_temperature_recorded: approximately 60%–90% of the melting temperature for Al matrix

microstructure_outputs.phase_transformation_details: Primary Si and Fe-containing intermetallic particles refined, spheroidized, and uniformly distributed after deposition; cast microstructure converted to fine equiaxed grains via dynamic recrystallization
